languages.text: {n}В глазах юноши вспыхивает безумная искорка.{/n} "Заря есть скрытая истина. Никому не дано лицезреть ее лицо! Но те, кто будут ей верны, встанут рядом с ней в час Последнего восхода, пожирающего все сущее! Но не ты. Ты — враг Зари, и, значит, будешь повержен{mf||а}".

{n}A spark of madness flashes through the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one is worthy of seeing her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах юноши вспыхивает безумная искорка.{/n} "Заря есть скрытая истина. Никому не дано лицезреть ее лицо! Но те, кто будут ей верны, встанут рядом с ней в час Последнего восхода, пожирающего все сущее! Но не ты. Ты — враг Зари, и, значит, будешь повержен{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: {n}A spark of madness lights up in the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one gets to see her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand at her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all of existence! They will, but you won't. You are an enemy of Aurora; therefore you will be struck down."

{n}A spark of madness lights up in the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one gets to see her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand at her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all of existence! They will, but you won't. You are an enemy of Aurora; therefore you will be struck down."

But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, thus you will be vanquished."

But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, thus you will be vanquished."

But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

languages.text: {n}Ein Funken des Wahnsinns zuckt durch die Augen des jungen Mannes.{/n} "Aurora ist die verborgene Wahrheit. Niemand ist würdig, ihr Gesicht zu sehen! Doch wer ihrem Willen treu ergeben ist, der steht an ihrer Seite, wenn die Letzte Dämmerung alles verschlingt! Ihr jedoch nicht. Ihr seid {mf|ein Feind|eine Feindin} der Aurora, daher werdet Ihr ausgelöscht werden."
languages.original_text: {n}A spark of madness flashes through the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one is worthy of seeing her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Funken des Wahnsinns zuckt durch die Augen des jungen Mannes.{/n} "Aurora ist die verborgene Wahrheit. Niemand ist würdig, ihr Gesicht zu sehen! Doch wer ihrem Willen treu ergeben ist, der steht an ihrer Seite, wenn die Letzte Dämmerung alles verschlingt! Ihr jedoch nicht. Ihr seid {mf|ein Feind|eine Feindin} der Aurora, daher werdet Ihr ausgelöscht werden."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux du jeune homme brillent d'un éclat de folie.{/n} « Aurore est la vérité cachée. Personne n'est digne de voir son visage ! Mais ceux qui lui sont fidèles se tiendront à ses côtés à l'heure de l'Aube finale qui consumera tout ! Ils se tiendront à ses côtés, mais pas vous. Vous êtes {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} d'Aurore, vous serez donc {mf|exterminé|exterminée}. »
languages.original_text: {n}A spark of madness flashes through the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one is worthy of seeing her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux du jeune homme brillent d'un éclat de folie.{/n} « Aurore est la vérité cachée. Personne n'est digne de voir son visage ! Mais ceux qui lui sont fidèles se tiendront à ses côtés à l'heure de l'Aube finale qui consumera tout ! Ils se tiendront à ses côtés, mais pas vous. Vous êtes {mf|un ennemi|une ennemie} d'Aurore, vous serez donc {mf|exterminé|exterminée}. »

languages.text: {n}年轻人眼中闪过疯狂的火花。{/n}“‘极光’就是被隐藏的真相，没人有权直视她的脸！不过，当吞噬万物的终末黎明到来时，那些忠于她的人会站在她身边！可你不会。你是‘极光’的敌人，而你注定被消灭。”
languages.original_text: {n}A spark of madness flashes through the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one is worthy of seeing her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻人眼中闪过疯狂的火花。{/n}“‘极光’就是被隐藏的真相，没人有权直视她的脸！不过，当吞噬万物的终末黎明到来时，那些忠于她的人会站在她身边！可你不会。你是‘极光’的敌人，你注定被消灭。”

languages.text: {n}若者の目に一筋の狂気が光る。{/n}「オーロラこそが隠された真実だ。彼女の顔を見るのに値する者はいない！だが、彼女に忠実な者たちは、全てを飲み込む最後の夜明けの時に彼女の側に立つだろう！彼らはそうする。しかし、お前らは違う。お前たちはオーロラの敵であり、そのために滅ぼされる」
languages.original_text: {n}A spark of madness flashes through the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one is worthy of seeing her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

traits.locale_text: {n}若者の目に一筋の狂気が光る。{/n}「オーロラこそが隠された真実だ。彼女の顔を見るのに値する者はいない！だが、彼女に忠実な者たちは、全てを飲み込む最後の夜明けの時に彼女の側に立つだろう！彼らはそうする。しかし、お前らは違う。お前たちはオーロラの敵であり、そのために滅ぼされる」

languages.text: {n}Una chispa de locura brilla en los ojos del joven.{/n} «Aurora es la verdad oculta. ¡Nadie es digno de ver su cara! ¡Pero aquellos que le son leales permanecerán a su lado a la hora del Amanecer Final que lo consumirá todo! Ellos sí, pero vosotros no. Sois enemigos de Aurora, por lo que seréis derrotados».
languages.original_text: {n}A spark of madness flashes through the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one is worthy of seeing her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una chispa de locura brilla en los ojos del joven.{/n} «Aurora es la verdad oculta. ¡Nadie es digno de ver su cara! ¡Pero aquellos que le son leales permanecerán a su lado a la hora del Amanecer Final que lo consumirá todo! Ellos sí, pero vosotros no. Sois enemigos de Aurora, así que seréis derrotados».

languages.text: {n}Genç adamın gözlerinde bir anlığına delilik kıvılcımı parlıyor.{/n} "Aurora, saklı gerçektir. Kimse onun yüzünü görmeye layık değildir! Ona sadık olanlarsa her şeyi yok edecek olan Nihai Şafak vaktinde yanında duracaklar! Onlar duracak, sen değil. Sen Aurora'nın düşmanısın, bu yüzden de öleceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}A spark of madness flashes through the young man's eyes.{/n} "Aurora is the hidden truth. No one is worthy of seeing her face! But those who are loyal to her will stand by her side at the hour of the Final Dawn that will consume all! They will, but not you. You are an enemy of Aurora, and so you will be vanquished."

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç adamın gözlerinde bir anlığına delilik kıvılcımı parlıyor.{/n} "Aurora, saklı gerçektir. Kimse onun yüzünü görmeye layık değildir! Ona sadık olanlarsa her şeyi yok edecek olan Nihai Şafak vaktinde yanında duracaklar! Onlar duracak, sen değil. Sen Aurora'nın düşmanısın, bu yüzden de öleceksin."
